text: "Never do the same mistake twice."
author: Gus Fring

text: "It's always been one step forward and two steps back."
author: Walter White

text: "I hide in plain sight, same as you."
author: Gus Fring

text: "This is what comes from blood for blood."
author: Gus Fring

text: "Sometimes the forbidden fruit tastes the sweetest."
author: Hank Schrader

text: "Yeah, Mr. White! You really do have a plan! Yeah, science!"
author: Jesse Pinkman

text: "I am not in danger, I am the danger."
author: Walter White

text: "I once told a woman I was Kevin Costner and it worked because I believed it."
author: Saul Goodman

text: "Scientists love lasers."
author: Saul Goodman

text: "We're done when I say we're done."
author: Walter White

text: "Just because you shot Jesse James, don't make you Jesse James."
author: Mike Ehrmantraut

text: "I am the one who knocks."
author: Walter White

text: "A good magician never reveals his secrets."
author: Jimmy McGill

text: "Either you fit the jacket, or the jacket fits you."
author: Kim Wexler

text: "Perfection is the enemy of perfectly adequate."
author: Jimmy McGill

text: "Sometimes the good guys win."
author: Jimmy McGill

text: "Got to look successful to be successful."
author: Jimmy McGill

text: "The lesson is, if you're gonna be a criminal, do your homework."
author: Mike Erhmantraut

text: "Ding! Ding! Ding!"
author: Hector Salamanca

text: "Tell me again."
author: Lalo Salamanca

text: "I get my best ideas when everyone else is asleep."
author: Lalo Salamanca

text: "I told you. Be nice."
author: Lalo Salamanca

text: "La familia es todo."
author: Lalo Salamanca

text: "What Colonel Sanders is to chicken, Saul Goodman is to the law."
author: Saul Goodman

text: "When you're in... you're in."
author: Nacho Varga

text: "If you make a deal with somebody, you keep your word."
author: Mike Erhmantraut

text: "I don't believe fear to be an effective motivator."
author: Gus Fring

text: "If you're committed enough, you can make any story work."
author: Saul Goodman

text: "Say my name."
author: Walter White

text: "The devil is in the details."
author: Skyler White
